queries.name: CFL_SMS_Failed
queries.query: select * from ( select trunc(s.Itrcvdate) datetime, count(1) total from SMSQUEUE s where s.bookedid is null and  s.status=50 group by trunc(s.Itrcvdate)  order by 1 desc) where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 15
queries.titel: CFL sms fail count for last 15 days

queries.name: Total_error
queries.query: select * from ( select trunc(logtime) datetime, sum(totalrequest) total from tblapilogsummery where status !=200 group by trunc(logtime) order by 1 desc) where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 15
queries.titel: Total error count for last 15 days

queries.name: Error_Status
queries.query: select status,  sum(totalrequest) total from tblapilogsummery where status !=200 and trunc(logtime)=trunc(sysdate-1)  group by status
queries.titel: Status wise error report for last 15 days

queries23.name: SignIn_SignUp_Bonus

queries23.name: Facebook_Purchase_Success
queries23.query: select * from (select  trunc(browsedt) datetime, count(1) total from tblappaudittrail_arc where browseurl = 'PurchaseMyOffer' and errormessage is null group by trunc(browsedt)order by 1 desc)where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 15
queries23.titel: Facebook purchase success for last 15 days

queries23.name: Facebook_Purchase_Failed
queries23.query: select * from (select  trunc(browsedt) datetime, count(1) total from tblappaudittrail_arc where browseurl = 'PurchaseMyOffer' and errormessage is not null group by trunc(browsedt)order by 1 desc)where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 15
queries23.titel: Facebook purchase fail for last 15 days

queries23.name: RBT_Purchase

queries23.titel: RBT purchase count for last 15 days
